The Cardano Foundation

Blockchain | Cryptocurrency | Decentralised Applications


Cardano is a decentralised platform that will allow complex programmable transfers of value in a secure and scalable fashion. Cardano is the first blockchain to be built in the highly secure Haskell programming language.

Testnet 0.3


Cardano is now in its public testing phase and Testnet 0.3 is live.

We are encouraging everyone to download Testnet 0.3, try out the platform and help us improve it further pre launch.
